title: EVENT: CityKinder Nikolausfeier Manhattan (Session II)
desc: Willkommen bei unserer Nikolausfeier It's that time of the year again!? Our Nikolausfeier feautres lot's of kids entertainment like our crafts corner, a music jam session practicing all those "Weihnachtslieder", the anticipated visit from Nikolaus, gifts for everyone and of course a photo op with Nikolaus.? Treats for grown-ups include cookies and Stollen, amazing Gluehwein and Grogg and our freshly baked waffles (okay - you might have to share them with your kids....) Servus Cookies  will provide us with original freshly baked Vanillekipferl, Mandelherzen, and Spitzbuben, which you will also be able to buy as gifts or for your holiday tables.? NOTE: The event is held in German? The event is in part made possible by our Annual Sponsors: www.gisny.org And our event sponsor:
